reviews.review_text: Great customer service, Sophie was an amazing help with advice and suggestions on what kind of a terrarium to purchase, how to decorate it and keep the eco system habitable. Sophie was very busy running the store while short staffed although they still found the time to go through everything with me in detail and help me pick out the best items. Whatever you are paying them, its not enough, give them a raise.

Amazing and a friendly bunch of  grooming staff. Brought in my 15 month old Samoyed for a full grooming the 1st time and he looked and smelled fabulous! Ive been back a 2nd time already. Great job! Thank you
Thanks Sarah! LARRY loves his new cut!
Nice staff/associates there. Clean and well organized aisles. You can found almost all the things you needed for your pet.
Hello, my kitten really likes this store, it has really good quality pet food and furniture here.

Helpful staff and organized shelves.  Reasonable prices.  Playing the game on the app, you can earn 10%, 15%, and 20% off coupons on one item, which can be stacked with other promotions.  Overall, it was a pleasant experience.
I adopted willy boi, William this week with the help of pet smart and crtc

Came here with my cocker spaniel for a few grooming appointments. Once for a wash with Matthew, once for a trim with Jade and two days ago for a sanitary trim with Julie. (A sanitary trim that I had to get after getting my puppy groomed somewhere else - not petsmart - where they failed to do this, leaving mats and leaving me needing to bring him somewhere else.) I have been nothing but happy with the professionalism and detail of work shown by both Jade and Julie. I regrettably took him somewhere else for his last groom, a mistake which I will not be making again. I will be back to Petsmart for his next full groom before we move cities. Thank you!
We got to a beautiful Betta, and the whole set up for around 45$ but they have a wide selection of fish and accessories,they have pretty much anything for fish and their matentience .
Aline did an amazing hair cut and nail trim on my little fur baby. 100% recommend her!

Perfectly sized location where theres a fair amount of options to choose from whether youre looking for food or grooming supplies for a fish, dog, cat, or what have you. I found the employees to have been quite friendly and helpful in aiding me to find what I was looking for.
My dog has been getting groomed by Julie for over a year now and she really is the best!! I highly recommend her
I always love bringing my dog here to pick out his treats! The staff is always so lovely and very helpful
Knowledgable staff that are willing to help you find what You need !

The staff is amazing and so so sweet! I bring my dog Milo here every month for a groom and his groomer Aline is the SWEETEST. I used to take him all the way to Vancouver until I read great reviews on Aline and decided to try this location out as it is much closer to my house. Each time I pick Milo up, the staff is super warm and welcoming. Aline does such a great job and I have no complaints. One time I got confused about his appointment time (thought it was later) and she was super sweet and understanding through it all. Cant recommend her and this location enough.

Very Happy with my Experience. I came all the way from Langley to pick up my new puppy. Tonight I made it just in time before this Petsmart closed. The manager helped me find everything I needed to care for my new puppy and he made sure I got the essentials for my puppy. very helpful and my puppy is really happy with his treats and chew toys.

Tbis is an awesome petstore, I got a betta there and they check its water for free each time I take it there and they are knowlegeable in giving advice how I should take care of my fish. Good job! & Thank you.
Convenient place. A bit different to park but with a little patience you will find a spot. Nice employees. Some discounts for aquarium stuff are pretty good but you have to take chances.
Not too busy, staff know where everything is. Made my trip quick and easy.

Booked my dog in for training class since the one we usually go to was fully booked. Didnt really expect too much from it since most reviews about their classes arent that great, but I was pleasantly surprised at how great the trainor was. Our dog trainor was Irene and she was so pleasant to work with. She was always willing to answer our questions, give different suggestions and really cared about making sure we understood every topic and assisted us whenever we were struggling to do certain exercises with our dog. Overall a really great experience taking the class with her!
Our Cleos doggie wonderland! Everything you need for dogs and other pets. Reasonable priced, great staff.
Lots of products and very helpful staff. All was clean and animals looked well cared for. Got a beautiful fighter fish and his setup.

Sweetest staff, today I was struggling to pick up a kitty litter and this bearded buff staff member with the biggest smile on his face offered me a cart and lifted the 40lb litter with one arm like it was nothing! and put it In a cart he brought me. It was the first time anyone in any store has done that for me. Amazing job petsmart! Glad to be shopping here.
Awesome service, very friendly staff and impeccably clean store my dogs love it here.

Great job!! I really enjoyed the training  experience at Pet Smart. Marianna was a wonder Trainer, very patient, understanding and right in cue with correcting the dogs and giving suggestions. I was sad to hear she was moving out of province. Overall it was a great experience and I have gained confidence in teaching our dog. Overall it was a great experience, great value and I definitely recommend
Julie is an amazing professional and so friendly and we got a great grooming service there. Super satisfied with the service.

Very friendly staff, sometimes our pup gets too excited and he peed inside the store, we are so sorry about it but the staff handle it like it happens everyday(I believe so too ) They also have grooming and training service.

Always a pleasure to visit the pet smart store in Burnaby and on Lougheed hwy I have always been a satisfied pet Parent . When shopping for my furbaby they always have the most fabulous and up to date pet supplies to spoil your pets and take care of their well being
Super friendly staff at this location. Never had an issue. Their grooming services are usually very booked up, so I d recommend trying to book a couple weeks in advance

We love Mariana! My dogs and I have been taking classes here and we love it. Mariana uses only positive reinforcements and helps me understand my dogs better, she also is able to adapt to the needs of each dog and owner. We have been to a few different dog training schools and so far, this has been our favorite!

Hands down my doggie has one of the best groomers ( Suzanne) in the area! My furbaby has very high anxiety and she knows exactly what to do with him. She has this calming factor with him. I wouldnt bring him anywhere else! I would like to add, all groomers are extremely good! But since my dog is high matienence, he needs to be with the same person. If I had it my way, I would take him to anyone there!

Great customer service. I always order online and pick up. They messed up the order on the recent one where they only gave me 1 of each product instead of the multiples. But I went back the next day and they were super nice and helpful

The girls at the salon are incredible! I have a nervous pup who hates baths and Aline, his groomer, is super patient and loving towards him. Its Its great team and I appreciate what they do for my Loki
Very well organized, staff are always well mannered. We come here for our beardie needs

Really helpful staff. They really know their cat stuff. We asked them advice on what to get or try for our five month old kitty, and they made great suggestions. A bunch were cat owners themselves and shared their experience. And when certain treats didnt work out, they were easily returned and refunded. Very understanding.

I was planning to buy a fish but I don t have a lot of information about the fish types and how to take care of them. Then the staff person name Laura helped me a lot she has the knowledge about all the fishes and their food. And also how to take care of tank. Thank you so much Laura
They have a very large selection of cat treats, and a variety of cat food brands. Whenever I am in the area I would stop by this PetSmart to see what new items they have.
Very talented and caring staff. They always take good care of my buddy.

This location has a really quick turnaround for cat products since the store is centrally located by the biggest mall in BC and is a bit smaller in size. Staff are friendly and its quite easy to ask questions if you ever have any! If youre looking for clearance items (ie from holiday collections), you may not run into any luck here. Just as a heads up!
Pet Smart is a nice friendly store, and has everything I need for my pet. My dog likes going there too!

Petsmart is our usual spot to grab all our pet supplies. Staff are friendly but sometimes its hard to get served in the fish/reptile department. Some days it seems like no one is working the floor and we have to confront the front cashier to get someone. Other than that, we are happy with everything else. Store is generally always clean and maintained.

Amazing collection of fish. I do not have any other pet, but as far as fish is concerned, this is a one stop shop for me. I can stop by any time and walk away with the species I want. Not to mention they have a wide range of fish food, and other accessories as well.

Great store huge selection and great prices when theres sales, no pet adoption during covid but was told pet adoptions can still be applied for online. Aside from that there was plenty of fish and pet toys but hey its a pet store. The staff were very accommodating and helpful and especially ecstatic when I asked about adoption.

I was babysitting my Granddaughters Little Dog he didn t like the rain so so went to a pet smart for a raincoat I was told by the sales girl that they put them away we joked about maybe keeping them out because I dint realized the rainy season was winter so I was on my way out and the sales Gir named Eden came running up and had gone into the back and took the time to find a Jacket I thought it was extremely caring and nice to go out of her way Great Customer Service

Always love Jade for grooming my babies, and the staff very helpful and very kind even though is not full service pet store They always try give you the best as they can which is very understandable!!

I like petsmart for their selection of dog produces, whether its for food or toys or just anything that I need for my dog. Theyre also my go to for bird food for my budgies. The associates are always friendly and always there to help or answer any questions.
The store is well maintained and the staff are very friendly and helpful. Groomers are awesome! Our dog has always been looked after well and has had a perfect grooming session every time. Thank you!

This store has everything you need for your pet. We were choosing a scratching pole for our cat. They have lots of them already assembled and ready to use. We bought one and a cashier was very friendly and gave us advice about how to use it properly, so our cat would understand where she should do scratching. At home we put the scratching pole in front of our sofa, so the cat can see us watching her scratching and amazingly! - she started scratching it right away to please us! Thanks a lot for the pole and for the advice!
Great staff, always friendly and helpful, and I love all the cat products! I can always find something new and different here. I bought some cat calming spray and it really helped my cats chill out.
The worker at the front knew my son was autistic so she understood the position when we got to the front of store. Excellent customer service skill.

I am so pleased with Petsmart at Metrotown!  The staff are just amazing!  We take our pom Lola in often to get groomed, or to just get her nails done.  Lola was their very first client when they first opened up!  The staff are friendly, professional,  and extremely helpful!  Ive been a loyal customer for years,  because they do such a great job with Lola!  If you havent had the opportunity to take your four legged family member here, I highly recommend it!  I love this Petsmart!!

Ive been taking Bella here for about a year or so. She is a 13 year old chocolate lab. The groomer named Winter is the best... so gentle and patient with her, I always know shes in good hands! Thank you for being so wonderful!
Great place to grab affordable and good quality pet supplies. I also got both our family hamsters here. This location is always clean and well stocked.

The grooming staff are amazing! We brought our rescue chihuahua x miniature pinscher here for over a year since we first got her and they have always been so good to her. They even talked me through how to cut her nails myself when I told them we were moving out of province. They have always done a quick, and impeccable job clipping her nails and have even given us heads up when our vaccines are expiring. Ohana and I miss them so much already, especially after her last nail trim in a new grooming salon, which wasnt half as good as the girls here ever did!

The staff are really kind and especially the tall guy in the back [august] super friendly and helped so much he was very good at his job and i can tell he puts the safety of the animals first at all times! i will be buying all my pet supplies here. Thanks

Big store with lots of different products at reasonable prices. Staff are friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful. I come here to get everything for my cat. Considering buying a lizard or fish from them too.
Store manager at this store(Josh), is simply Awesome!! Very understanding about the concern I had while retuning an item.
We have our new Hammy from here.

Good nice people, relatively good selection for aquariums and well maintained fish and tanks. O was in other pet store for fish and there was 1-2 dead fish in almost every tank so I was afraid of buying from there.
Great customer service. Was able to find a lost receipt because I was a member
They always have everything I need for my 2 cats. Staff always have great advice when needed as well. Awesome loyalty programs for certain foods, helps cut down on cost. Love this place!!

I had to bring in my puppy to the Station Square location as the last location I went to failed to get her mats out and actually trim her down. I booked my appointment with Allison and she was excellent. She took very well of Mika, knowing the whole ordeal will most likely result with Mika being shaven down due to the severity of the mats. Mika got a fresh hairdo for the summer and definitely would come back to this location. Allison did a great job communicating/reassuring me with any changes need to be done. Thank you!

I took my dog Tony to Sarah at the Metrotown salon. Tony is a real mamas boy but she made him feel special and he allowed her to cut his hair and nails without biting her. this is always a plus as I do hate it when blood is drawn. However, she did a great job, he looks simply fab, and he is only slightly upset by the ordeal. Thank you Sarah. You are a groomer extraordinaire for my nervous little dog with extreme separation anxiety.
Burnaby station is great for grooming exactly opposite of Lougheed branch. we had really good experience for taking our dogs to this store.
They have very nice staff, I always go there for shopping although another Pet Smart location is near than this to me because I like it :)
The young Asian lady working here is very nice and kind. I would keep coming back to petsmart because I feel appreciated & valued as a customer.
the groomers have always been incredibly patient, kind, and enthusiastic to my dog and I since I was a kid to now bringing her in for her trims. I really appreciate it :)
I got great support and advice from Eddy, the sales associate. His recommendations when I got my new puppy was so helpful. I highly recommend this store.

A big shout out to Eddy !!! I went in today to get cat food and litter. I wrenched my lower back and was unable to bend down to lower shelf to get the tins I needed. Eddy was an Angel and also helped me with the litter !!! Many Thanks Again Eddy !!!
Alison is a fabulous groomer.  My dog loves her and always looks fantastic when she is done.  I would highly recommend Alison and her colleagues!
Amazing customer service. Been here several times in the last couple weeks and the staff has gone above and beyond to help me find everything I needed.
This is a great store. Made my first purchase today. The staff couldnt have been more helpful.
Best store for all kinds of things you might need for your beloved pets!
Associates were very friendly and polite. I found what I was looking for at a good price. I will be coming back.
Tess was amazing! I was adopting two baby rats and she recommended the right products and overall was really helpful.
Got some pet tags and dog toys from here. Great service! Always quiet which is nice as someone who has sensory issues.
Love this store and their exchange policy. Never let the customer down. One place where my oet is Welcome and cared for.
Like this place because I can come with my pet and she can shop by herself....also we take training for her.  Very good and friendly staff that always help ...
Good  lady was moody she shouldve stayed homr
Great staff! They helped me finding out what I needed.
Great place with cheap deals! Love the fish & birds.. really would like to get a gerbil 1 day from there too
Staff ensured to ask and help out customers find the products they need. Great customer service.
Love the store! Always happy experiences here.
Awesome shop. Any kind of food you imagine can be found here. Plus they let pets in, I like it because your pet can help you in choosing and it is fun !
Helpful staff, always find everything I need
Good location, parking could be issue many times.
Love this store. Super friendly and helpful staff. Always neat and tidy.
Easy to find, nice staff
Great staff and selection. Very knowledgeable. Nicole was an absolute joy and very helpful and went above and beyond.
Super friendly and helpful staff. Ive always had a really good experience at this location!
They have good variety of products for my reptiles and the animals they have are well taken care of
Always have had a good experience at this one (Station Square) Very friendly and helpful staff. Definitely recommend A++
Love this place. We get food and litter for our cat here. Great service and staff.
my favorite one. the one cashier, i did not get her name, is super knowledgeable, compassionate. thanks
The only place in Burnaby you can buy crickets! Super friendly and helpful staff. Clean and organized.
Best customer service ever receive by Nikki ( store manager ) I had a big problem with my fish tank and she help me a lot , thanks Nikki and thanks to your excelente team !!
One of my favorite places.
Everyone is friendly, kind and easy to talk with. I manage to find everything easily. Thank you.
Awesome place for products and information on looking after your pets and the staff are awesome and will answer all of your questions.
I get fish food there so it great and clean store and fast service
